author: jsalfeld
body:
#### PR description:

Noticed that muons were not reconstructed in 11_1_0 in scouting. As per suggestion of Andrea and Simone added "customisePixelGainForRun2Input" from 11_2_0:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/HLTrigger/Configuration/python/customizeHLTforCMSSW.py#L173

With this added and adding the lines:
from HLTrigger.Configuration.customizeHLTforCMSSW import customisePixelGainForRun2Input
process = customisePixelGainForRun2Input(process)

To the configuration, muons are reconstructed and the corresponding filters do not anymore reject 100% of the events.

title: Add customise pixel gain
